description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Pilgrim of Beauty; the Cottager's Sabbath; and other poems. Now first collected ... With twenty-three vignettes ... from designs by H. Warren" Author: MULLEN, Samuel. Contributor: WARREN, Henry - President of the New Society of Painters in Water-Colours Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11645.g.7." Page: 282 Place of Publishing: London, 1845 Date of Publishing: 1845 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002580690 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
